item.title: About me
item.description:
Val Paliy

Here are my portfolio and IDE settings.

Summary

Held a position of a web master/library computer class assistant in Biddeford High School, Biddeford, ME, USA. Acted as an aid to the school’s main office staff. Helped a number of teachers repair problems with hardware/software.

Took part in various program presentations as an alum of both Freedom Support Act/Future Leaders Exchange (ACTR/ACCELS) and Undergraduate Exchange (IREX) exchange programs, which were held for applicants, as well as in various seminars for alumni in both Ukraine and Washington DC.
